headline: Eaton Stock Rises as Spin-Off Revealed. Why It’s Going All-In on Planes and AI Data Centers.
summary: Monday, electrical technology provider  Eaton  announced it would spin off its Mobility group to, well, boost its growth.  The transaction allows Eaton to “focus on higher growth, higher-margin Electrical and Aerospace businesses directly aligned to secular megatrends,” according to the company.  Eaton Electrical provides solutions for a host of industries including power-hungry AI data centers, which are boosting demand growth for electricity to levels not seen in decades.

headline: General Electric Company: The Growth Runway Looks Longer Than The Market Thinks
summary: General Electric delivered double-digit revenue and EPS growth in 2023, with Q4 revenue up 20% and orders up 74%, supporting a positive long-term outlook. Learn more on GE stock here.

headline: Tech Rebound Soothes Greenland-Induced Shivers, Just As Earnings Season Hits Its Stride
summary: With only 13% of companies reporting thus far, S&P 500 EPS growth for Q4 currently stands at 8.2%. Headline whiplash impacted US markets last week. The tech sector continues to dominate.
